prerequisites.supportedUseCase: This is an interactive dashboard that prompts you to enter a macAddress of a device and visualize the device owner's access, full inventory of digital identities, and the resources they have access to.

widgets.title: Device Owner's Digital Identities and Access

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}" WITH _class='Device'
(THAT (HAS|OWNS|MANAGES) User)?
THAT (IS|OWNS|MANAGES) Person
THAT IS User 
(THAT HAS UserGroup)?
THAT (ASSIGNED|HAS|USES) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application|Token)
(THAT ASSIGNED AccessPolicy)?
(THAT ALLOWS *)?
RETURN TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}" with _class='Device'
(THAT (HAS|OWNS|MANAGES) User)?
THAT (IS|OWNS|MANAGES) Person
THAT IS User 
THAT (HAS|ASSIGNED) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application) as entity
RETURN entity._type as accessType, count(entity) as accessCount order by accessCount DESC

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND unique "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}" with _class='Device'
that has (Finding|Problem) as f
return 
  f._type, 
  f.displayName, 
  f.description, 
  f.severity, 
  f.numericSeverity,
  f.status,
  f.createdOn,
  f.updatedOn,
  f.webLink

widgets.title: Group Membership

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'HostAgent' or 'User' or 'HostAgent')
  (that RELATES TO user_endpoint)?
  (that OWNS << Person)?
  (that (IS|HAS) User)?
  that HAS UserGroup
RETURN 
  UserGroup.displayName as "Group Name", 
  UserGroup._type as "Group Type"

widgets.description: Returns AD and Other Group Memberships
